markdown:
Even bulkier than their non-woolly cousins, these rhinoceroses have a shaggy pelt of long, thick fur and a huge, crescent-shaped horn. Woolly rhinos inhabit areas of arid tundra and cold steppes, spending much of their day grazing for sustenance. **[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 22 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 [Woolly Rhinoceros](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3169) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 293 1.1 **Perception** +11; [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +13 **Str** +6 **Dex** +1 **Con** +5 **Int** -4 **Wis** +3 **Cha** -1 --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +11 **Will** +15 +2 status to all saves vs. [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) **HP** 100 **Cold Adaptation** The woolly rhinoceros treats [environmental cold effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) as if they were one step less severe.
**[Ferocity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=63)**
--- **Speed** 35 feet **Melee** horn +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d12+6 piercing **Melee** foot +16, **Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning **Rhinoceros Charge** The rhinoceros Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the rhinoceros moved at least 20 feet, the Strike's damage increases to 3d12+6. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or be automatically [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380)back 5 feet and knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88) by the force of the blow. **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=81)** Medium or smaller, foot, DC 21
name: Woolly Rhinoceros

text: Woolly Rhinoceros Even bulkier than their non-woolly cousins, these rhinoceroses have a shaggy pelt of long, thick fur and a huge, crescent-shaped horn. Woolly rhinos inhabit areas of arid tundra and cold steppes, spending much of their day grazing for sustenance. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 22 Unspecific Lore : DC 20 Specific Lore : DC 17 Woolly Rhinoceros Source Monster Core pg. 293 1.1 Perception +11; scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Athletics +16, Survival +13 Str +6 Dex +1 Con +5 Int -4 Wis +3 Cha -1 --- AC 25 Fort +17 Ref +11 Will +15 +2 status to all saves vs. cold HP 100 Cold Adaptation The woolly rhinoceros treats environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe. Ferocity Reaction --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action horn +16 (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+6 piercing Melee Single Action foot +16, Damage 2d8+6 bludgeoning Rhinoceros Charge Two Actions The rhinoceros Strides twice, then makes a horn Strike. As long as the rhinoceros moved at least 20 feet, the Strike's damage increases to 3d12+6. A Medium or smaller creature struck by this attack must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or be automatically Shovedback 5 feet and knocked prone by the force of the blow. Trample Three Actions Medium or smaller, foot, DC 21
